Html:
I'm using VS2010 and MVVM Light through NuGet, then updated MVVM Light through NuGet, giving:
  • GalaSoft.MvvmLight V4.4.32.18939
  • GalaSoft.MvvmLight.Extras V4.4.32.18940
  • ServiceLocator V1.3.0.0
We are targeting .NET 4.0, but due to our build server rules I get:
"Assembly generation failed -- Referenced assembly 'GalaSoft.MvvmLight' does not have a strong name"

I see in your source code the SNK files, is there any way I can get this strongly named???

I have the same issue. After upgrading MvvmLight to V4.4.32, "sn.exe -v" states that the binaries in NET40 are not strongly named anymore.
BTW: The binaries in the NET45 folder are strongly named.
